resources.string: Tap the screen to start a new game
What do you want to do?
The goal of the game is to get the numbers in the specific setup shown below:

But the trick is that there is only three different ways to manipulate the board, you can rotate the board ninety degrees left or right, and you can push a number down (down can change as board is flipped). Here is the controls.


Swipe Left: rotate left
 Swipe Right: rotate right
 Swipe Down: push number down


Numbers will also fall every few seconds. Have fun.
